column4: morning peoples, i got a new hd today and i want to copy entire op system onto it from old one, whats the easiest way to do this?
that is more complicated than it seems.  The easiest is to install fresh on the new drive, then copy over you /home dir from the old drive to the new one.
ok, hit me up when you screw it up and you are installing from scratch anyways.  G'luck.
